title: The founder of crypto lender Celsius has admitted to lying to customers about how their money would be used and manipulating markets for his personal gain.
content: Alex Mashinsky, former CEO of bankrupt crypto lender Celsius, has pleaded guilty to two counts of fraud, which together carry a maximum sentence of 30 years in prison. As part of the plea deal, Mashinksky has agreed to forfeit $48 million in ill-gotten gains. The collapse of Celsius was part of a chain reaction that brought the crypto industry to its knees.
author: Joel Khalili
